maqras.text: 56|75|Eteke ma'i sapata karaicho naksatraraajira astacalara
56|76|arau niscaya e'ito eta mahasapata, yadi tomaloke janilahemtena
56|77|niscaya e'ito mahimanbita kora'ana
56|78|yito ache suraksita kitabata (lipibad'dha).
56|79|Paraitrasakalara bahirae ana konorae iyaka sparsa karaiba noraarae.
56|80|E'ito srstijagatara pratipalakara paraa aratirna.
56|81|Tathapi'o tomaloke e'i banika tuccha buli bhabicha neki
56|82|arau tomaloke asbikara karaake'i tomalokara jiraika karai laicha
56|83|eteke kiya nahaya—praana yetiya kanthagata haya
56|84|arau tetiya tomaloke (asahaya hai) ca'i thaka
56|85|arau ami tomalokatakai'o tara bechi ocarata thako, kintu tomaloke dekha noporaa.
56|86|Eteke yadi tomaloke hicapa-nikaca arau pratiphalara sanmukhina nohoraa
56|87|teneha'le tomaloke se'ito (atmato) ghuraa'i nana kiya? Yadi tomaloke satyabadi
56|88|tara pichata si yadi naikatyapraaptasakalara ejana haya
56|89|tente tara babe thakiba bisraama, uttama jiranopakarana arau sukhamaya jannata.
56|90|Arau si yadi haya somphalara dalara ejana
56|91|tente (taka koraa ha’ba) ‘tomara prati chalama’, yihetu tumi somphalara ejana.
56|92|Kintu si yadi haya asbikarakarai, bibhraantasakalara ejana
56|93|tente tara atithya karaa ha’ba utala panira dbaraa
56|94|arau jahannamara dahanerae
56|95|niscaya e'ito suniscita satya.
56|96|Eteke tumi tomara mahana pratipalakara namara paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karaa.
57|1|Akasamandala arau prthiraita yi ache sakalorae allahara paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karae; arau te'om paraakramasali, prajnamaya.
57|2|Akasamandala arau prthiraira sarbamaya kartrtba te'omrae'i; teraemi jirana dana karae arau teraemi mrtyu pradana karae; arau teraemi sakalo bastura oparata ksamatabana.
57|3|Teraemi adi arau anta; prakasya (oparata) arau gopana (ocarata) arau teraemi sakalo bastu samparke samyaka aragata.

57|4|Teraemi akasasamuha arau prthirai chaya dinata srsti karaiche; tara pichata te'om arasbara oparata uthiche. Te'om jane yi bhugarbhata praraesa karae arau yi bhugarbhara paraa olaya, arau akasara paraa yi aratirna haya arau yi akasalai uthi yaya; arau tomaloka ya’te'i nathaka kiya-- te'om tomalokara lagata ache, arau tomaloke yi karaa se'i samparke allaha samyaka drasta.
57|5|Akasamandala arau prthiraira sakalo kartrtba te'omrae'i arau allahara phale'i sakalo bisaya pratyabartita haya.
57|6|Teraemi raatika dinara bhitarata praraesa karaaya arau dinaka raatira bhitarata praraesa karaaya; arau teraemi antarara bisayasamuha samparke samyaka aragata.

57|7|Tomaloke allaha arau te'omra raachulara prati imana ana arau allahe tomalokaka yi sampadara uttaraadhikarai karaiche tara paraa byaya karaa. Eteke tomalokara majata yisakale imana posana karae arau (allahara pathata) byaya karae te'omlokara babe ache mahapuraskara.

57|8|Arau tomalokara ki ha’la, tomaloke allahara prati bisbasa nakaraa kiya? Athaca raachule tomalokaka tomalokara pratipalakara prati imana anibalai ahbana karaiche, arau allahe'o tomalokara paraa angikara grahana karaiche, yadi tomaloke mumina horaa.
57|9|Teraemi nija bandara prati suspasta ayatasamuha aratirna karae, tomalokaka andhakarara paraa poharalai anara babe; arau niscaya allaha tomalokara prati karaunamaya, parama dayalu.

57|10|Arau tomalokara ki ha’la, tomaloke allahara pathata kharaca nakaraa kiya? Athaca akasamandala arau prthiraira miraacha kerala allaharae'i. Tomalokara majata yisakale bijayara agata byaya karaiche arau yud'dha karaiche, te'omloka (arau parabartisakala) samana nahaya. Te'omloka sihamtatakai maryadata sraestha yisakale parabarti samayata byaya karaiche arau yud'dha karaiche. Kintu allahe ubhayara babe'i kalyanara pratisrauti diche; arau tomaloke yi amala karaa se'i samparke allaha sabisesa aragata.
57|11|Enekuraa kona ache, yiye allahaka uttama rna diba? Teneha’le te'om tara babe iyaka bahugune brd'dhi karai diba arau tara babe ache sanmanajanaka puraskara.

57|12|Se'idina tumi mumina nara-naraisakalaka dekhibalai paba ye, te'omlokara sanmukhata arau som phale te'omlokara nura daurai ache. (Koraa ha’ba) ‘aji tomalokara babe susambada haiche jannata, yara talata nadisamuha prabahita, tata tomaloka cirasthayi ha’ba, e'itorae'i mahasaphalata’.

57|13|Se'idina munaphika purausa arau munaphika naraisakale imandarasakalaka ka’ba, ‘tomaloke amara babe alapa apeksa karaa, yate tomalokara nurara paraa ami alapa grahana karaiba parao’. Koraa ha’ba, ‘tomaloke nijara pichaphale ubhati yoraa arau nurara sandhana karaagai’. Tara pichata ubhayara majata sthapana ha’ba eta praacira, ya’ta eta duraara thakiba, yara bhitarata thakiba rahamata arau bahirata thakiba sasti.

57|14|Munaphikasakale muminasakalaka mati ka’ba, ‘ami tomalokara lagata nachilone? Te'omloke ka’ba, ‘haya, kintu tomaloke nije'i nijaka bipadagrasta karaicha arau tomaloke pratiksa karaichila arau sandeha karaichila arau micha akanksa'i tomalokaka prataraita karai raakhichila, arau arasesata allahara nirdesa ahi ga’la, arau (antima samayalaike) mahapratarake tomalokaka allaha samparke prataraita karaichila’.

57|15|‘Eteke aji tomalokara paraa kono muktipana grahana karaa naha’ba arau yisakale kupharai karaichila sihamtara paraa'o nahaya. Jahanname'i tomalokara abasasthala, e'itorae'i tomalokara upayukta sthana; arau kimana ye nikrsta e'i pratyabartanasthala
